headline: Ask HN: Is there any tools to improve the efficiency of integration test?
description: It seems that Kubernetes, open source will be the new trend in software development. However, I found that the daily debugging of microservices is inconvenient since we should go through the CI/CD process repeatedly. Is there any reliable ways to debug and test without changing the original services in kubernetes clusters?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 有没有什么工具可以提高集成测试的效率？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 有沒有什麼工具可以提高集成測試的效率？
description_zh-Hans: 看来，Kubernetes、开源将是软件开发的新趋势。但是，我发现微服务的日常调试很不方便，因为我们要反复经历CI/CD过程。有没有什么可靠的方法可以在不改变kubernetes集群中原有服务的情况下进行调试和测试？
description_zh-Hant: 看來，Kubernetes、開源將是軟件開發的新趨勢。但是，我發現微服務的日常調試很不方便，因為我們要反覆經歷CI/CD過程。有沒有什麼可靠的方法可以在不改變kubernetes集群中原有服務的情況下進行調試和測試？
